page.title: 12IN THE NEWS
page.content: The Evening Echo has had a number of reports about Barling like the House with a phantom that flushes the loo.It all happened when they went on holiday. Their next door neighbour had been told to keep an eye on the house while they were away.She looked though the window and there was a light on in the bathroom and all of a sudden the loo flushed and a little old lady appeared at the window. From that day onwards it has been called the house with a phantom that flushes the loo. It was also reported that Barling won a cup for the best kept village. sponsored by the Rural Community Council of Essex. In February 1985 plans were reported for a 18 hole golf course near the River Roach. In 1985 it was also reported that a yacht club wanted to move to Barling Creek.
